title: LINKIN PARK To Release A New Single Next Week
description: "Up From The Bottom" is coming March 27. The post LINKIN PARK To Release A New Single Next Week appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
excerpt: "Up From The Bottom" is coming March 27.
text: Linkin Park is continuing their meteoric comeback with vocalist Emily Armstrong next week with a brand new single. Linkin Park is slated to drop "Up From The Bottom" on March 27, though it's not clear if this also means there will be a follow-up to the band's 2024 comeback record From Zero. I'm guessing not, considering how much Linkin Park is touring. Linkin Park's ongoing world tour features guests like Queens Of The Stone Age, Spiritbox, AFI, Architects, grandson, Jean Dawson, JPEGMAFIA, and PVRIS on select dates. Get the remaining dates below (there are a lot of 'em). Tickets are available here. 4/26 Moody Center Austin, TX (+ grandson)4/28 BOK Center Tulsa, OK (+ grandson)5/1 Van Andel Arena Grand Rapids, MI (+ grandson)5/3 CFG Bank Arena Baltimore, MD (+ html:
Linkin Park is continuing their meteoric comeback with vocalist Emily Armstrong next week with a brand new single. Linkin Park is slated to drop "Up From The Bottom" on March 27, though it's not clear if this also means there will be a follow-up to the band's 2024 comeback record From Zero. I'm guessing not, considering how much Linkin Park is touring.

Linkin Park's ongoing world tour features guests like Queens Of The Stone Age, Spiritbox, AFI, Architects, grandson, Jean Dawson, JPEGMAFIA, and PVRIS on select dates. Get the remaining dates below (there are a lot of 'em). Tickets are available here.
